<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/api/v1/integrations/templates/connections/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



**Requires an Access Token as the bearer token.**

Update a connection template.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","title":"Id"}},{"name":"x-organization-id","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations.","title":"X-Organization-Id"},"description":"Select the working organization.
